title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Identify data sources, stakeholders, and target users. Determine project timeline and milestones.

title: Data Acquisition and Preprocessing
description: Collect and preprocess patient health data from various sources. Ensure data quality, privacy, and compliance with regulations.

title: Data Modeling and Feature Engineering
description: Explore and analyze the patient health data. Identify relevant features and engineer new features as needed for predictive modeling. Ensure data privacy and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., HIPAA). Consider feature selection techniques to reduce dimensionality and improve model performance. Document the feature engineering process and rationale.

title: Model Training and Evaluation
description: Develop and train machine learning models for predicting medical outcomes. Evaluate model performance and optimize hyperparameters.

title: Backend Development
description: Design and implement a scalable, secure, and performant backend system for serving the trained machine learning models and handling data input/output. The backend should support real-time and batch data processing, model versioning, and monitoring.

title: Frontend Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the prediction system, visualizing results, and managing data.

title: System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the backend and frontend components. Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations, such as HIPAA for healthcare data.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the HealthPredictor system to a production environment. Set up monitoring and logging for system health and performance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
